notes:
As part of its continual assessment of issues directly affecting community security and safety, OCVP conducted an extensive collection of primary data in GALKAYO District - the capital of the central Mudug region of Somalia.  
Further details @ http://www.ocvp.org/ocvp5/index.php/publications/dcsa/52-galkayo-district-conflict-and-security-assessment-report-2015
